params.tag: @param {number | "earliest" | "pending" | "latest"} tag - the integer pre-defined block parameter, either earliest, pending or latest
params.address: @param {EthereumAddress} address - the string representing the address to check for balance
params.contractaddress: @param {EthereumAddress} contractaddress - the string representing the token contract address to check for balance
params.endblock: @param {number} [endblock] - the integer block number to stop searching for transactions
params.endblockRequired: @param {number} endblock - the integer block number to stop searching for transactions
params.enddate: @param {string} [enddate] - the ending date in yyyy-MM-dd format, eg. 2019-02-28
params.enddateRequired: @param {string} enddate - the ending date in yyyy-MM-dd format, eg. 2019-02-28
params.sort: @param {"asc" | "desc"} [sort] - the sorting preference, use "asc" to sort by ascending and "desc" to sort by descending
params.startblock: @param {number} [startblock] - the integer block number to start searching for transactions
params.startblockRequired: @param {number} startblock - the integer block number to start searching for transactions
params.startdate: @param {string} [startdate] - the starting date in yyyy-MM-dd format, eg. 2019-02-01
params.startdateRequired: @param {string} startdate - the starting date in yyyy-MM-dd format, eg. 2019-02-01
params.txhash: @param {Hex} txhash - the string representing the transaction hash to check for internal transactions
